segments.text: From my view, the kitchen has an open window letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Below it, the sink is overflowing dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying her dish, foot in the puddle, totally zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, showing the tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, the boy's on that tilting stool reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in the jar, the other with a plateâ€”clever but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's cooperating, arm up like she's part of the heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the mom misses all this action behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open wide, framing their sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage is spreading, but no one's reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I get annoyed thinking about the slip hazard for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies look delicious, making me wish I had one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the instability of that stool worries me a lot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a mix of charm and impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope it all turns out okay without any falls.
segments.speaker: PAR
